data.text: @rbclouston @Birdyword HK is a week behind with testing and has given up on all tracing and mandatory testing. Most people testing at home don’t even report. Even if they do, RAT test aren’t included in the numbers. The real numbers are much, probably 5 times higher.
@Birdyword Crazy world, I have been not meet my husbandfor over 38 mouths, fxxx CCP.
@Birdyword HK is protecting those other countries at the moment
@Birdyword Must maintain the fiction that HK and China are pure and Covid is a virus of weak and decadent foreigners
@Glaven1994 @Birdyword I’m curious- do other countries record rat test results in their numbers?  I presume UK does.
@Birdyword Australia is still so high because so many of us never had Covid before. So it’s going to be a tough slog for HK.
